attributes.action: Force M.P's to disclose accounts and expenses without the right to go to court to keep OUR money thats been spent a secret
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: M.P's have already spent £50000 on a battle to keep their accounts unrevealed. What they dont realise is that A; this is OUR money for them to spend on us, not theirs to spend on themselves...and B; there is not  company in the world that can keep its finances closed if the government asks it to open up. So why does the government get to cover its own finances over? How can we trust our government if they openly declare that they will fight to keep their expenses secret? Sounds very "third world" to me

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
